experience.description: Leading IT solution delivery and multi-vendor management for Vodafone Oman's digital transformation initiatives.
responsibilities: Lead end-to-end delivery for IT solutions within Vodafone Oman's IT Programme & Delivery, ensuring seamless implementation from requirements gathering to operational handover
Manage multi-vendor deliveries, driving timelines, cost efficiency, and quality across application and omnichannel platforms
Oversee Agile sprint execution, backlog health, delivery metrics (KPIs); ensure transparency, accountability, and alignment across cross-functional teams
Serve as the main interface for project delivery, facilitating interlock between Network, Commercial, Finance, and IT teams

experience.description: Short-term contract focusing on critical system enhancements and security improvements.
responsibilities: Enhanced the company's website by adding new features and performing maintenance to improve user experience
Built an API gateway wrapper around the existing API to facilitate access for external parties, enhancing integration capabilities
Resolved a critical TLS 1.0 vulnerability, preventing a costly system rewrite by implementing a single-line code fix to enforce TLS 1.2, ensuring zero downtime and significant cost savings

experience.description: Full-stack software engineer working on diverse projects with various technology stacks in an Agile environment.
responsibilities: Utilized diverse tech stacks under the guidance of knowledgeable mentors
Conducted client visits and participated in remote meetings to ensure clear communication and understanding of project requirements
Practiced Agile methodology for efficient project delivery
Worked closely with multidisciplinary teams comprising designers, project managers, product managers, and software engineers with diverse levels of expertise
Developed software solutions using RESTful APIs and Remote Procedure Calls (RPC) via RabbitMQ for reliable communication between distributed systems
Demonstrated advanced proficiency in Postman for designing, testing, and debugging APIs

experience.description: Academic research position supporting faculty-led research initiatives.
responsibilities: Assisted in conducting research projects under the guidance of senior researchers and faculty members
Contributed to literature reviews, data collection, and analysis to support ongoing research initiatives
